prompts: Create a wolf-like Pokemon with sharp claws and a rocky appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the mountains and has a fierce demeanor.
Imagine a canine Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains and has a striking color palette.
Generate a Pokemon with a powerful howl and agility, perfect for swift movements.
Make a Pokemon that has a dual nature and can adapt to various habitats, especially in caves.
Design a Pokemon with a rugged exterior and the ability to navigate through challenging landscapes.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases loyalty and bravery, with a fierce protective instinct.
